category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_IndexedProperties_for_Phrased_Search
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of attributes which will be used to create search phrase suggestions. Values should be the type name and internal property name in the format "type.property" (e.g. "POM_application_object.owning_user").
